reviewText: I am giving it 5 stars bank on my exspectation.  Most of my dvd collection is still in its wrapper & not viewed yet.
Plot hole-ridden disaster of a movie; hilarious for all the wrong reasons.  I enjoyed this immensely, but then -- I am easily amused.

I enjoyed the film, though it did show its age.  You have Maxwell Caulfield playing a mega bad cop, who will not let anything get in his way.  Paul Johansson is a witness with a video camera who ends up going on the run because of what he has on film.  Fast paced and not sure whats going to happen next.  If you can get a copy, do as you will enjoy it.
